flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I have no idea what fluorescent salts are, or if this method actually works at all, but Holmes gives such a thorough explanation of the process, that it's almost as if he wants the viewers to be able to do it themselves.

This film is in the public domain.

The full film is available here.

lines.text: How to read the impressions left on a piece of paper (according to Sherlock Holmes)
lines.text_raw: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0JfT0V_ZKss|How to read the impressions left on a piece of paper (according to Sherlock Holmes)]

guide.summary: A splendid tutorial that was hidden in plain sight in the 1943 film "Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon."
guide.title: How to Read the Impressions Left on a Piece of Paper (according to Sherlock Holmes)
